titleStmt.title: Augustin P. Mauge to James W. Tate
CWG2746

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Beriah Magoffin: Governor's Official Correspondence File, Civil Appointments, 1859-1862

creation.placeName: New York, New York County, New York

body.p:
AUGUSTIN P. MAGUÉ,
Avocat et Notaire Français,
ATTORNEY AND COUNSELLOR AT LAW,
Notary Public and Commissioner of Deeds,
REAL ESTATE AGENT.

ALSO,
COMMISSIONER
TO TAKE
Acknowledgments and
Depositions
FOR

MASSACHUSETTS,
NEW JERSEY,
ALABAMA,
ARKANSAS,
CALIFORNIA,
GEORGIA,
INDIANA,
KENTUCKY,
LOUISIANA,
CONNECTICUT,
ILLINOIS,
OHIO,
MAINE,
MARYLAND,
MICHIGAN,
MINNESOTA,
MISSOURI,
NEVADA,
NEW HAMPSHIRE,
NEW MEXICO,
NORTH CAROLINA,
SOUTH CAROLINA,
RHODE ISLAND,
TENNESSEE,
VERMONT,
VIRGINIA,
WISCONSIN,
OREGON,
UTAH,
NEBRASKA,
WASHINGTON.
☞ Deeds, Mortgages, Agreements, and all other legal Instruments, carefully drawn and acknowledged.
Particular attention paid to searching titles and investing funds.

Honorable James W. Tate, assistant
Secretary of the State of Kentucky.
Sir,
I will be most happy to be re-appointed Commissioner of Deeds for the State of Kentucky, resident in the city, county and State of New York.
Hereinclosed please find $5, fees for such re-appointment.
N. B. -- Good Security given, when required, for all Moneys Collected.
My present commission expiring the 25th. of this month, I will fell under obligation to you, if you will have the Kindness to send new commission as early as convenient.

I respectfully remain, Dear Sir
Your very obedient servant.
A. P. Magué
No. 7, Chambers Street, New York city.

New York
Comr. of Deeds
A. P. Mague
City
Com Issd. Mar 20 1862
